meanings.sent1: She always acts bigheaded and thinks she is better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: His bigheaded attitude often rubs people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bigheaded behavior, no one takes him seriously.
meanings.sent4: Her bigheaded nature makes it hard for her to make true friends.
meanings.sent5: The bigheaded boy believed he was the king of the playground.

meanings.sent1: The bigheaded statue in the park is quite impressive.
meanings.sent2: The bigheaded baby looked adorable in the oversized hat.
meanings.sent3: The bigheaded doll stood out among the other toys.
meanings.sent4: His bigheaded appearance made finding a helmet that fit a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The bigheaded mannequin displayed the latest fashion trends.

meanings.definition: Having an exaggerated sense of self-importance
meanings.sent1: The bigheaded actor demanded special treatment on set.
meanings.sent2: She became bigheaded after receiving praise for her work.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of talent, he was bigheaded about his abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her bigheaded behavior alienated her from her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The bigheaded CEO thought the company couldn't function without him.
